meanings.definition: An act of referring someone or something for consultation, review, or further action.
meanings.sent1: The doctor made referrals for his patients to see specialists.
meanings.sent2: She received many referrals from satisfied clients.
meanings.sent3: The referrals for the best pizza place in town led us to a tiny hidden gem.
meanings.sent4: His referrals to the latest movie were spot-on; it was a blockbuster hit.
meanings.sent5: The referrals for the new restaurant were so positive that we had to try it out.

meanings.definition: The act of directing someone to a different place or person for help or information.
meanings.sent1: The librarian provided referrals to the students looking for specific books.
meanings.sent2: After the accident, the police officer gave referrals to the nearest hospital.
meanings.sent3: The referrals to the lost and found desk were surprisingly entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her referrals to the best hiking trails in the area were like hidden treasures.
meanings.sent5: The referrals to the expert mechanic saved me time and money on car repairs.
